org.libex.base

Class SettableOnce<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libex.base.SettableOnce<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Supplier<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FinalizableSettableOnce

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
@NotThreadSafe
public class SettableOnce<T>
extends Object
implements com.google.common.base.Supplier<T>
    A wrapper for a field that should only be set once. After the wrapped value has been set once to a non-null value attempting to set it again will throw an IllegalStateException. For a thread-safe implementation see ConcurrentSettableOnce
    Author:
    John Butler
